Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Guardians won Game 4 to force a fifth and deciding game in their American League Division series.
Tarik Skubal will start for the Detroit Tigers, while Matthew Boyd will start for the Cleveland Guardians.
The Guardians snapped a string of 11 straight losses in elimination games dating back to Game 6 of the 1997 World Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The UNDER is 4-2 in the Guardians' last 6 matchups against American League teams.
In their last 12 games, the Tigers have cashed the OVER three times.
Dating back to the regular season, the Tigers have won 4 of their last 5 series.
